search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Transcribe (transcribecom.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Transcribe can be found at: https://transcribe.com/pricing .

extracted_content.content:
Transcribe Effectively
----------------------

##### Transcribe removes one of the boring parts from your projects. You get a searchable text document in a matter of minutes and can focus on the important tasks instead of mastering type - rewind - retype skill.

Plans
-----

Monthly billing

Yearly billing Save 45%

$99.99 ~$180.00~

Yearly billing

Suitable for those who process audio recordings on a regular basis.

All Free features, plus:

*   Included 5 Hours of File Transcriptions MonthlyAdditional hours completely free of charge. Unused transcription hours roll over to the next month.
    
*   All export formats (PDF, DOCX, SRT, JPG)We support all major document formats: PDF, DOCX, etc.
    
*   500 files of audio content storageWe can keep your audios for you.
    
*   Web browser transcription editorOnline editor can be used on Windows, on Desktop, etc.
    
*   SynchronizationYou can use application on many devices.
    
*   Priority supportWe are always here to help you.
    

$399.99 ~$720.00~

Yearly billing

Suitable for those who process audio recordings in a team.

All Pro features, plus:

*   Additional 30 hours of transcription time each month30 hours of transcription time every months.
    
*   1 000 files of audio content storageWe can keep your audios for you.
    
*   Powerful collaboration: All team members also have access to PRO featuresAbility to create teams for collaboration (up to 5 teams).
    
*   Team audios are available anytime and on any deviceUp to 1000 audio files with infinite storage time.
    

### Free

$0

Yearly billing

Great for getting started.

Enjoy your first 30 minutes of transcription time for free to test the quality and see for yourself whether our transcription service fits your needs.

![Image 1](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3)

Buy additional credit for $5/hour, or save money and get 10 hours for $30. Time credits NEVER expire.

![Image 2](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3)

We offer corporate discounts if you require more than 100 hours of transcription time. If this applies to you, please get in touch to discuss how we can help you.

![Image 3](blob:http://localhost/b9a31d3949b1882a09ed2f8508d538f3)

Compare features
----------------

*   Automatic transcription
    
    Just provide a file with proper audio, the rest works like magic.
    
*   120 languages and dialects
    
    We support all major languages.
    
*   Audio/video files import
    
    We support all major file formats.
    
*   Text document export
    
    Your transcription can be edited anywhere.
    
*   Reliable translation
    
    Your transcription can be translated to other languages.
    
*   Precise summaries
    
    We can summarize huge transcription in no time.
    
*   Zoom integration
    
    With Zoom integration you can get transcription of your meeting in minutes.
    
*   Night mode
    
    User Friendly UI and UX Design.
    
*   Unlimited Realtime
    
    Realtime recording with unlimited transcriptions (iOS only).
    
*   All export formats (PDF, DOCX, SRT, JPG)
    
    We support all major document formats: PDF, DOCX, etc.
    
*   500 files of audio content storage
    
    We can keep your audios for you. Regular accounts only allow audio access for two weeks. There is no such limitation for PRO accounts.
    
*   Synchronization
    
    You can use application on many devices.
    
*   Web browser transcription editor
    
    Online editor can be used on Windows, on Desktop, etc.
    
*   Priority support
    
    We are always here to help you.
    
*   Bulk import
    
    Import many files at once, zip archives support.
    
*   Zapier integration
    
    Transcript Emails/Dropbox files/etc automatically.
    
*   Audio content storage
    
    Your audio files available anytime and on any device.
    
*   Additional Hours of File Transcriptions Monthly
    
    Additional hours completely free of charge. Unused transcription hours roll over to the next month.
    
*   Teams & collaboration features
    
    Up to 5 teams for collaboration and delegation of tasks.

Frequently Asked Questions
--------------------------

How much does it cost to convert audio or video to text?

Transcribing requires time on your account. Each 10 minutes long file will consume 10 minutes from your account. You can purchase additional time in two packets:  
1) 1 Hour: $4.99  
2) 10 hours: $29.99

What are PRO subscription bonuses?

Pro plan (subscription) gives you 5 hours of server based transcription time per month (so if you need more hours you can buy them the usual way) and unlimited transcription time for realtime voice recorder transcriptions.

These hours are added to your account automatically, every month. The time credits roll over to the next period, all the time credits you have on the account stay with you until used.

What else the Pro plan offers you:  
●

Best transcription accuracy - we use more sophisticated translation models for our subscribers.  
●

Unlimited real-time transcription via voice recording in the app.  
●

Ability to export transcriptions to a number of popular formats (like MS Word, Docx, SRT, etc)  
●

Your files won’t get deleted from server 2 weeks after uploading  
●

Ability to edit transcriptions in web browser.

What are BUSINESS subscription bonuses?

Business plan gives you 30 hours of server based transcription time per month, additional collaboration features (via Teams) and all PRO features for you and your team members.

Do you have any corporate offers?

We offer corporate discounts if you require more than 100 hours of transcription time. If this applies to you, please get in touch to discuss how we can help you.

Use the Transcribe App for speech-to-text transcriptions 💬. Upload your audio or video file and get notes instantly. Try for free and see the advantages.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Unused transcription hours roll over to the next month. Corporate discounts available for bulk purchases.
